mapper.update: INSERT INTO messages ( messages.conversationId, messages.senderId, messages.receiverId, messages.content, messages.sendTime ) VALUES ( #{conversationId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, #{sendTime} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( (SELECT `user`.account as account1,`user`.nickName as nickName1,`user`.headerImg as headerImg1 FROM user ) receiver INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( (SELECT `user`.account,`user`.nickName,`user`.headerImg FROM user ) a INNER JOIN messages ON a.account = messages.senderId ) )b ON receiver.account1 = b.receiverId ) WHERE (senderId=#{currentUserAccount} and receiverId=#{friendAccount}) or (senderId=#{friendAccount} and receiverId=#{currentUserAccount}) ORDER BY messageId desc
